thread.title: AllianceBernstein Global High Income Fund, Inc. Reports Third Quarter Earnings

author: cnbc.com
title: AllianceBernstein Global High Income Fund, Inc. Reports Third Quarter Earnings

organizations.name: alliancebernstein global high income fund, inc.
alliancebernstein global high income fund, inc

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 23, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- AllianceBernstein Global High Income Fund, Inc. (NYSE: AWF), a registered closedâ€‘end investment company, today announced earnings for the third quarter ended December 31, 2017.
Total net assets of the Fund on December 31, 2017 were $1,201,448,629, as compared with $1,212,324,876 on September 30, 2017 and $1,161,973,952 on December 31, 2016. On December 31, 2017 the net asset value per share was $13.93 based on 86,229,677 shares of common stock outstanding.

For the period October 1, 2017 through December 31, 2017, total net investment income was $18,073,151 or $0.21 per share. The total net realized and unrealized loss was $(10,867,037) or $(0.13) per share for the same period.
